seo.title: Matter Protocol the basic rules for building the NFT world
seo.desc: The matter protocol is a NFT synthesis and splitting protocol, which combines chaotic NFTs with a simple rule.

index.title: Matter Protocol the basic rules for building the NFT world

h2.l3: is used to build an orderly, reliable, and complex NFT world

why.h2: The NFT of tomorrow needs matter protocol today
why.p: The goal of the matter protocol is to establish an order in the NFT world.
why.h3: Today's NFT is chaotic and disorderly
why.desc: Matter Protocol will change the current status quo and organize through basic rules to communicate with a richer NFT building, just like 1+1=2 in the physical world. With basic rules, there will be a richer form.

footer.desc: Sign up for the matter protocol Weekly newsletter for the latest on releases, upcoming developments, community events, and more.
